comments.text:
We were dealing with a vandal who would add and remove large numbers of CCs at a time on a number of bugs (see Bug #704753 for info).  In order to fight this, we ended up applying a modified version of the patch on Bug #28849  (attached). 

Something like this should be possible, although it may need to be configurable so that backwards compatible behavior can be maintained.

comments.text:
The change here would be restricting people from adding CCs unless they're in editbugs. bug 28849 already restricted who can remove them.

I think the problem here is that add_cc and remove_cc don't use check_can_change_field, and they really should. I would accept a patch to make that happen, no matter what. I probably wouldn't accept a patch to restrict non-editbugs users from CC'ing, though.
